column2: Ready for some more coding in Lightspeed?

Most excellent. So as Ada told you, in Lightspeed you're going be able to add some new levels. 

But for now we've got an issue with Level 3 we'd like you to fix. Go ahead and launch Lightspeed now, please.
Play Level 3 and be on the lookout for anything unusual.

Someone made those asteroids way too big! You'll need to get in there and adjust that. 

Just like before, you'll have to hack the app to fix it. But this time you'll be using code to do it.

Click on the Spawn tab. See the function called `spawnEnemy()`? That's where we create the asteroids.

There you can change the scale to something smaller so the level becomes playable again.
See that `scale: 150`? Change that number to something smaller like 50.
Make sure to play Level 3 and beat it to see if your solution works correctly.
If that worked, the asteroids should be smaller. Can you beat this level?
If you can't beat it, go back to the code panel and try making it even smaller.
Excellent. That'll do it. We've got a few more things to fix. Come find me when you're ready for more coding!
